description:
Answer the call of the wild. The progressive design, with borrowed elements from Salomon trail running shoes, is built for tough backpacking trips over rough and steep terrain. Nubuck leather and a lightweight chassis system stabilize your ankles and provide support while carrying heavier loads.

  • Nubuck leather and synthetic uppers are comfortable and durable
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable booties keep rain and puddles out
  • Rubber heel and toecap protect from impact and abrasion
  • ADV-C chassis supports and stabilizes your ankle without limiting forefoot flexibility
  • High traction Contagrip® rubber outsoles for durable grip
name: Salomon Quest Element Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
